name: Run Rufus: A Tilting, Chasing Game
name_original: Run Rufus: A Tilting, Chasing Game
description:
Rufus has escaped! Chase Rufus for as long as you can while trying to avoid obstacles!

Run Rufus is a fast-paced, 8-bit retro, casual game. Chase Rufus while avoiding obstacles. Unlock fun characters. Master the chase to be on top of the leaderboards!

Good luck!
